home.description: Use our app to track your progress and get the most out of your college experience. Be in control of your future.

calculator.description: Use our calculator to calculate your GPA and more. We will help you achieve your goals.
calculator.title: Calculator

download.description: Download our app to access your data from your phone. You can also use our app to track your progress on the go.
download.title: Download our app

planning.description: Plan your next semester with ease. Use our requirements checker to make sure you are on track to graduate.
planning.title: Planning

save.description: Login safely with Google, Discord or Github to save your data. We will keep your data safe and secure. You can access your progress from anywhere.
save.title: Save your data

search.description: Not sure what to take? Use our search feature to find the perfect course for you. Filter based on your needs and requirements.
search.title: Search

tracking.description: Track your progress with us. We will help you keep track of your grades, assignments, and more. Be on top of your game.
tracking.title: Tracking

home.title: Track your progress with us

internalError.description: We are already working to solve the problem.
internalError.title: Internal Server Error.

maintenance.description: We are currently working on the site. Please check back later.
maintenance.title: Under Maintenance

notFound.description: Sorry, we can't find that page. Please check the URL and try again.
notFound.title: Something's missing.

offline.description: You are currently offline. Please check your internet connection.
offline.subTitle: You are offline.
offline.title: Offline
